item.title: Ohio approves new map that could gain GOP two House seats
item.description: Ohio officials agreed to new congressional map lines, positioning Republicans to gain two seats in next year's elections.

item.title: Trump calls for Senate Republicans to end the shutdown by scrapping the filibuster
item.description: President Trump wants Senate Republicans to open the government by going around Democrats to end the legislative filibuster.
